banana: a long curved fruit with a thick yellow skin and soft flesh, that grows on trees in hot countries
toast: sliced bread that has been browned by dry heat
apple: a round fruit which is not an orange
salutation: something that you say to welcome or say hello to sb; the action of welcoming or saying hello to sb
pie: fruit baked in a dish with pastryon the bottom, sides and top
command: an order given to a person or an animal
